channel.title: MoparCraft's Minecraft Tutorial List!
channel.description:
Here you will find a list of tutorials that are useful for Minecraft.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [b][size=24pt]SERVER WISE[/size][/b] [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487127.0.html]Making Your Own Server -Tom_BETA[/url]
[url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=836]Portforwarding Your MC Server -Skype [/url]
[b][size=24pt]GRAPHICS WISE[/size][/b] [url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?t=4843]Making Your Own Skin -Swedman[/url]
[url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=45136]Making Your Own Texture Pack -Kookajamo[/url]
[b][size=24pt]GAMEPLAY WISE[/size][/b] [url=http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Tutorials/Beginner's_guide]Beginner's Guide -Minecraft Wiki[/url]
[url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,472694.0.html] Minecraft's Basics -Tom_BETA[/url]
Moar to Come.

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[/quote]

It would appear you’ve spelled graphics wrong.[/quote]Was in a hurry. Did this before I went to school. But, thanks though.
